channel.title: Not So Common Thoughts
channel.description: A blog about technology, AI, and more

item.title: Don't just do more, think more
item.description: A personal reflection on how AI-driven productivity gains should be reinvested in thinking, not just doing.

item.title: AI and the Rise of Judgement Over Technical Skill
item.description: As AI removes technical barriers, judgement becomes the key differentiator.

item.title: Permission to Enjoy
item.description: A reflection on seniority, freedom, responsibility, and the power of a mentor's simple advice.

item.title: Building a Music Player: YouTube as a Backend
item.description: How I built a music player for kohlhofer.com that pulls from a YouTube playlist, fetches video backgrounds, and focuses on an integrated audio/visual listening experience.

item.title: Let Go and Trust
item.description: A reminder that excellence comes from trust, not control.

item.title: Vibe Coding kohlhofer.com: Creation at the Speed of Thought
item.description: How I built kohlhofer.com trying out a new approach to design and software development.
